content: I have created several python packages and apps for various purposes. Few of them are listed here:
title: Projects

content: ArgmarkThis is a neat little program that can take in argparse based python scripts and create documentation detailing help and usage.
title: Projects

content: DocCleanSay you need to scan a document using your phone camera. But the paper is crumpled, or has a coffee mug stain, DocClean can clean it up for you!
title: Projects

content: Slurm ScripterNeed to generate a slurm script for your code? Here is a web app!
title: Projects

content: YourPulsar/FRB search mode data is written in either PSRFITS for Filterbank format. Your is unified, user-friendly reader/writer for such data.
title: Projects

content: FETCHNo one likes to sit and label candidates. Use this set of deep learning models for FRB/RFI binary classification and relax.
title: Projects

content: Hi! I am Devansh Agarwal. I work at the intersection of Deep Learning, High-Performance Computing and Big Data. I have a passion for projects which use any combination of the above and live by the mantra of let’s process lots of data and let’s do it really fast! I recently graduated with a Ph.D in Physics from the West Virginia University where I worked on searches for Fast Radio Bursts. You can check out my work here and find a talk about it below!
title: About
